name: condescendingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows that you think you are more important or more intelligent than someone else: He shook his head and smiled condescendingly. “Alex, honey, I’m on the phone,” she said, condescendingly. See
condescending
More examplesFewer examplesIain got up and patted her condescendingly on the shoulderStop condescendingly assuming that poor fat people are fat because they eat more junk food. Her intention, the rapper explained condescendingly, was to "educate" us.
